Package server.API

Class FoodApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.API.FoodApi
  • public class FoodApi
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the integration of TheFoodDB api. This is an online database of various meals which contains various information on each item of food, such as ingredients, and instructions on how to make them. These are given as JSON objects, and are then converted to a meal object which can be displayed in various ways.
